Posts.Content: Sassy:   You'll be pleased to know I'm not going to say how sorry I am.  You have a great writing style, your blogs are fantastic.  I particularly enjoyed the description of how you are spending your summer at the expense of the NHS.   Thank you for sharing your story. I will be following your fight every step of the way. Best Wishes Pam
Posts.Title: Post-surgery results and treatment plan ...

Posts.Content: HUGS Daisy I know the waiting is terrible but better that they are being thorough and coming up with the right answers! Hang in there. Pam xxxx
Posts.Title: Second time around? Results tomorrow
